Query: What are the office hours?
Response: Our office hours are from 9 AM to 6 PM, Monday through Friday.

Query: How do I find the employee handbook?
Response: You can find the employee handbook on the company intranet under the HR section.

Query: How many vacation days do I have left?
Response: You can check your remaining vacation days on the HR portal under 'My Leave Balance'. If you need further assistance, please contact HR.

Query: How do I apply for maternity leave?
Response: To apply for maternity leave, please fill out the maternity leave request form available on the HR portal and submit it to your manager for approval.

Query: When is the next payday?
Response: The next payday is on the last working day of the month.

Query: How do I change my bank account for salary deposits?
Response: To change your bank account details, please update your information on the HR portal under 'Payroll Information' or contact the payroll department.

Query: What should I do if I get injured at work?
Response: If you get injured at work, report the injury to your supervisor immediately and seek medical attention if necessary. Fill out an incident report form available on the HR portal.

Query: What are the COVID-19 protocols in the office?
Response: Please follow the COVID-19 protocols outlined in the health and safety section on the company intranet. This includes wearing masks, maintaining social distance, and regular hand sanitization.

Query: Are there any upcoming training sessions?
Response: You can find the schedule for upcoming training sessions on the HR portal under 'Training Calendar'.

Query: How do I enroll in a professional development course?
Response: To enroll in a professional development course, visit the 'Training and Development' section on the HR portal and select the course you're interested in.

Query: How do I report workplace harassment?
Response: To report workplace harassment, please contact the HR department directly or use the anonymous reporting tool available on the HR portal.

Query: What is the process for filing a grievance?
Response: To file a grievance, please complete the grievance form available on the HR portal and submit it to the HR department. You will be contacted for a follow-up meeting.

Query: How do I access my performance review?
Response: You can access your performance review on the HR portal under 'My Performance'. If you have any questions, please contact your manager.

Query: What is the process for setting goals for the new quarter?
Response: To set goals for the new quarter, use the goal-setting tool on the HR portal under 'Performance Management' and discuss them with your manager.

Query: How do I nominate someone for an employee recognition award?
Response: To nominate someone for an employee recognition award, fill out the nomination form on the HR portal under 'Employee Recognition'.

Query: What are the criteria for receiving a performance bonus?
Response: The criteria for receiving a performance bonus include meeting or exceeding your performance goals, contributing to team success, and demonstrating company values. Details are available in the 'Compensation' section on the HR portal.

Query: What are the responsibilities of employees or contractors when they plan to work from a location other than their base office?
Response: Employees or contractors planning to work from any location other than their base office location will be considered as working from a remote location. They must notify management via email before relocating from their remote work location.

Response: They need to send an email to both HR Support at hrsupport@pursuitsoftware.biz and Technical Support at techsupport@pursuitsoftware.biz.

Query: What happens if someone doesn't comply with this policy?
Response: Pursuit Software reserves the right to take appropriate disciplinary action for noncompliance with this policy.

Query: What equipment is required for remote work?
Response: A secure, up-to-date computer or laptop that meets our hardware and software requirements,Depending on job requirements, a company-issued or personal mobile device may be necessary for accessing corporate applications or for communication.

Response: For certification to be eligible for reimbursement, it must be done on the company's recommendation.

Response: To be eligible for reimbursement:1.The employee must pass the certification exam,2.If the employee fails the exam,they may take a second attempt,In this case,the reimbursement will be for the maximum of the two exam fees(either the first attempt or the retake)3.If the employee fails the exam a second time,there will be no reimbursement for any attempt.

Query: When will the fees be reimbursed?
Response: The fees will be reimbursed 90 days after the date of certification.

Query: What happens if I fail the exam on my first attempt?
Response: If you fail the exam on your first attempt, you can take a second attempt,The reimbursement will cover the maximum of the two exam fees (either the first attempt or the retake).

Query: And if I fail the second attempt?
Response: If you fail the second attempt,there will be no reimbursement for any attempt.
